regen.absent_element: continuation of visual and audible alert until termination
regen.new_specification: A continuous visual and audible alert shall remain active in the cab until the Railway emergency call is terminated.

regen.absent_element: Ongoing alerts until call termination or upon activation failure
regen.new_specification: The system shall maintain continuous visual and audible alerts in the cab until the Railway emergency call is terminated or if there is a failure in call activation.

regen.absent_element: continuous visual and audible alerts until the calls are terminated
regen.new_specification: A continuous visual and audible alert shall be maintained in the cab until the Railway emergency call is terminated.

label: Once the call is terminated, the continuous visual alarm indication in the cab shall cease.
